name: Oli's LIfe
description:
Oli is a 14 year-old girl living in a fantastic world.

She lives with her parents where only a forest separates the house of her parents from her grandmother’s one. 

Not having returned to her grand-mother for more than 10 years due to a child trauma because of the family’s dog, she decided to take her bravery in her hands and go out of her parents' home to try to return to her grandmother’s home. She will have to face the insects, monsters and fantastic animals inhabiting the forest of her world until she gets to her biggest trauma, Spaghetti the family’s dog. 

Endowed with magic, Oli can therefore use fireballs to defeat monsters but also use a magic of plant creation to climb and walk through the forest.
